text: Does anyone know of a recent release that would cause redirects to suddenly start acting differently than they were doing before? We had some old redirects living in the redirects area (<http://mydomain.com/?p=xxxx|mydomain.com/?p=xxxx>) which never effected our domain before, then all of sudden our "<http://mydomain.com|mydomain.com>" actually started following that specific redirect, but it never did before
